title: Painting
provenance_text:
Georges Collignon [1923-2002], Paris, France, until November 1952; G. David Thompson [1899-1965], Pittsburgh, PA, November 1952 until October 1953 [2]; his gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1953.

Notes:
[1]. The painting was no. 48 in "The 1952 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Paintings" held at Carnegie Institute, October-December 1952.
[2]. Mr. Thompson purchased the painting from the International; his check to the artist for 50,000 FF (about $145) is dated November 20, 1952 (see curatorial file for copies of relevant correspondence.)
